properties.value: Back to History

properties.message: Jumlah request melebihi jumlah sisa preform

properties.value:
<script>
    
    $(document).ready(function (){
        $("[name=nama_preform]").change(function () {
            var item = $(this).val(); // Get the value from input field
            console.log("apaaaa 0-->"+ item);
            getSisaStock(item); // Call function to fetch details
        });
        
        function getSisaStock(item){
            console.log("panggil ws preform dari dropdown -->"+item);
            $.ajax({
                url: "#request.contextPath#/web/json/plugin/org.joget.jsp.GetSisaPreform/service?",
                type: "GET",
                data: { preform : item },
                dataType: "json",
                success: function(res){
                    const qty_preform = res.total_pre_form;
                    
                    $("[name=sisa_preform]").val(qty_preform);
                    console.log("sisa preform --> "+qty_preform);
                },
                error: function (xhr, status, error) {
                        console.log("Error: " + xhr.responseText);
                    }
            });
            
        }
    });
</script>

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    prod.c_id_produksi_botol as id_produksi_botol,
    prod.c_nama_sku as nama_sku,
    prod.c_nama_produk as nama_produk, 
    prod.c_tanggal_produksi as tanggal_produksi,
    prod.c_tanggal_selesai_produksi as tanggal_selesai_produksi,
    prod.c_nama_preform as nama_preform,
    prod.c_mesin_produksi as mesin_produksi,
    prod.c_sisa_preform as sisa_preform,
    prod.c_requestProduksi as requestProduksi,
    prod.c_catatan_request_produksi as catatan_request_produksi
FROM app_fd_produksi prod
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = prod.c_id_produksi_botol
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.value:
Proses Produksi
Pegawai Tanggal Mulai Selesai Jumlah Cacat Jumlah Produksi Catatan Produksi

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    prod.c_sisa_target_produksi as sisa_target_produksi, 
    prod.c_proses_produksi as proses_produksi,
    prod.c_total_cacat as total_cacat,
    prod.c_total_produksi as total_produksi
FROM app_fd_produksi prod
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = prod.c_id_produksi_botol
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.value:
Aktual Produksi
Pegawai Produksi Waktu Masuk Shift Aktual Masuk Gudang Aktual Cacat Produksi Catatan Hasil Produksi Label PCS/Bal

<script>

    $(document).ready(function(){
        
        $('#sisa_target_produksi').on('change', function(){
            var sisaProduksi = parseInt($('#sisa_target_produksi').val());
            var aktualProduksi = parseInt($('#totalAktual').val());
            var requestProduksi = parseInt($('#requestProduksi').val());
            console.log("sisaProduksi : "+sisaProduksi);
            console.log("aktualProduksi : "+aktualProduksi);
            console.log("requestProduksi : "+requestProduksi);
            var prosessProduksi;
            
            if (aktualProduksi >= requestProduksi){
                prosessProduksi = 'Achieve';
                console.log("lolos ->"+prosessProduksi);
            } else{
                prosessProduksi = 'notAchieve';
                console.log("tidak lolos ->"+prosessProduksi);
            }
            $('#approveAktual').val(prosessProduksi);
            
            console.log("variable wf : " + $('#approveAktual').val());
        })
    })

</script>

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    prod.c_aktual_produksi as aktual_produksi,
    prod.c_approveAktual as approveAktual,
    prod.c_sisa_target_produksi as sisa_target_produksi,
    prod.c_aktual_cacat_produksi as aktual_cacat_produksi,
    prod.c_totalAktual as totalAktual,
    prod.c_catatan_pengawasan as catatan_pengawasan
FROM app_fd_produksi prod
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = prod.c_id_produksi_botol
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.value:
Barang Keluar
Nama SKU Request Pengeluaran Gudang

<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
       // ubah nama customer sesuai dengan channel yang dipilih
       $('[name=channel]').on('change', function() {
           var value = $('[name=channel] option:selected').text();
           
           if (!(value === 'Offline')) {
               $('[name=nama_customer]').val(value);
               $('[name=nama_customer]').css({'pointer-events':'none'});
           } else {
               $('[name=nama_customer]').val('');
               $('[name=nama_customer]').css({'pointer-events':'auto'});
           }
       })
    });
</script>

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    kel.c_id_barang_keluar as id_barang_keluar,
    kel.c_nama_customer as nama_customer,
    kel.c_order_id as order_id,
    kel.c_channel as channel,
    kel.c_tanggal_keluar as tanggal_keluar,
    kel.c_item_keluar_json as barang_keluar,
    kel.c_alamat_customer as alamat_customer,
    kel.c_catatanRequestBarangKeluar as catatanRequestBarangKeluar
FROM app_fd_keluar_barang kel
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = kel.c_id_barang_keluar
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

SELECT 
    kel.c_pickUp as pickUp
FROM app_fd_keluar_barang kel
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = kel.c_id_barang_keluar
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

SELECT id, c_nama_pre_form AS `nama sku` 
FROM app_fd_pre_form
UNION
SELECT id, c_namaProduk AS `nama sku` 
FROM app_fd_sku_master;

SELECT 
    masuk.c_id_barang_masuk as id_barang_masuk,
    masuk.c_nama_produk as nama_produk,
    masuk.c_tanggal_masuk as tanggal_masuk,
    masuk.c_gudang as gudang,
    masuk.c_jumlah_barang as jumlah_barang,
    masuk.c_catatan_request_barang_masuk as catatan_request_barang_masuk
FROM app_fd_masuk_gudang masuk
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = masuk.c_id_barang_masuk
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

SELECT 
    masuk.c_tanggal_masuk_aktual as tanggal_masuk_aktual,
    masuk.c_jumlah_barang_aktual as jumlah_barang_aktual,
    masuk.c_catatan_barang_masuk as catatan_barang_masuk
FROM app_fd_masuk_gudang masuk
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = masuk.c_id_barang_masuk
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    masuk.c_approveAktual as approveAktual,
    masuk.c_catatan_approve_barang_masuk as catatan_approve_barang_masuk
FROM app_fd_masuk_gudang masuk
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = masuk.c_id_barang_masuk
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.value:
<script>
    // Handling changes in the 'sku_produk' input field
    $(document).ready(function (){
        $("[name=sku_produk]").change(function () {
            var item = $(this).val(); // Get the value from input field
            console.log("apaaaa 0-->"+ item);
            getDetailItems(item); // Call function to fetch details
        });
        
        $('[name=input_manual]').change(function() {
            var item = $(this).val();
            console.log('input manual : ', item);
            getDetailItems(item);
        })
        
        // Function to send AJAX request to fetch product details
        function getDetailItems(item) {
            console.log("hasil ws qeury 1-->"+nama_sku);
            console.log("hasil ws qeury 2-->"+item);
            $.ajax({
                url: "#request.contextPath#/web/json/plugin/org.joget.jsp.GetDetailProduk/service?",
                type: "GET",
                data: { sku_produk: item },
                dataType: "json",
                success: function (res) {
                    // Assuming 'res.nama_sku' is the desired value
                    const nama_sku = res.nama_sku;
                    const sisa_qty = res.qty;
                    
                    $("[name=nama_sku]").val(nama_sku); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    $("[name=sisa_stock]").val(sisa_qty); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+nama_sku);
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+sisa_qty);
                },
                error: function (xhr, status, error) {
                    console.log("Error: " + xhr.responseText);
                }
            });
            
        }
    })
</script>

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    pindah.c_id_pindah_barang as id_pindah_barang,
    pindah.c_tanggal as tanggal,
    pindah.c_dari_gudang as dari_gudang,
    pindah.c_ke_gudang as ke_gudang,
    pindah.c_nama_sku as nama_sku,
    pindah.c_sisa_stock as sisa_stock,
    pindah.c_gudang_produksi as gudang_produksi,
    pindah.c_gudang_packing as gudang_packing,
    pindah.c_total_item_pindah as total_item_pindah
FROM app_fd_item_pindah pindah
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = pindah.c_id_pindah_barang
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

properties.value:
<style>
    #ke_gudang {
        pointer-events : none;
    }
</style>

<script>
    // Handling changes in the 'sku_produk' input field
    $(document).ready(function (){
        $("[name=sku_produk]").change(function () {
            var item = $(this).val(); // Get the value from input field
            console.log("apaaaa 0-->"+ item);
            getDetailItems(item); // Call function to fetch details
        });
        
        $('[name=namaProduk]').change(function() {
            var item = $(this).val();
            console.log('input manual : ', item);
            getDetailItems(item);
        })
        
        // Function to send AJAX request to fetch product details
        function getDetailItems(item) {
            console.log("hasil ws qeury 1-->"+nama_sku);
            console.log("hasil ws qeury 2-->"+item);
            $.ajax({
                url: "#request.contextPath#/web/json/plugin/org.joget.jsp.GetDetailProduk/service?",
                type: "GET",
                data: { sku_produk: item },
                dataType: "json",
                success: function (res) {
                    // Assuming 'res.nama_sku' is the desired value
                    const nama_sku = res.nama_sku;
                    const sisa_qty = res.qty;
                    const sisa_g_produksi = res.gudang_produksi;
                    const sisa_g_packing = res.gudang_packing;
                    
                    $("[name=nama_sku]").val(nama_sku); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    $("[name=sisa_stock]").val(sisa_qty); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    // $("[name=gudang_produksi]").val(sisa_g_produksi); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    // $("[name=gudang_packing]").val(sisa_g_packing); // Set the value in the corresponding field
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+nama_sku);
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+sisa_qty);
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+sisa_g_produksi);
                    console.log("hasil ws qeury 3-->"+sisa_g_packing);
                },
                error: function (xhr, status, error) {
                    console.log("Error: " + xhr.responseText);
                }
            });
            
        }
        
        var dariGudangVal = $('[name=dari_gudang]').val();
        
        if (dariGudangVal === 'gudang_produksi') {
            $('[name=ke_gudang]').val('Gudang Packing')
        } else if (value === 'gudang_packing') {
            $('[name=ke_gudang]').val('Gudang Produksi')
        }
        
        $('[name=dari_gudang]').on('change', function(){
            var value = $(this).val();
            if (value === 'gudang_packing') {
                $('[name=ke_gudang]').val('Gudang Produksi')
            } else if (value === 'gudang_produksi') {
                $('[name=ke_gudang]').val('Gudang Packing')
            }
        })
    })
</script>

properties.sql:
SELECT 
    audit.c_id_audit as id_audit,
    audit.c_nama_sku as nama_sku,
    audit.c_tanggal_masuk as tanggal_masuk,
    audit.c_total as total,
    audit.c_gudang_produksi as gudang_produksi,
    audit.c_gudang_packing as gudang_packing,
    audit.c_catatan_audit as catatan_audit
FROM app_fd_audit_sku_balance audit
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = audit.c_id_audit
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'

SELECT 
    audit.c_status as status,
    audit.c_catatan_hasil_audit as catatan_hasil_audit
FROM app_fd_audit_sku_balance audit
join app_fd_flow_stock stock on stock.c_id_flow = audit.c_id_audit
where stock.c_id_flow = '#requestParam.c_id_flow#'
